eligibilityCriteria.highSchoolDiploma: Completion of a recognized secondary school diploma or equivalent.
eligibilityCriteria.minimumGPA: A minimum GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale.
specificSubjectRequirements: Successful completion of Mathematics and English at the secondary level.
eligibilityCriteria.languageProficiency: IELTS score of 6.5 or TOEFL iBT score of 80.

requiredDocuments: Copy of passport or national ID

eligibilityCriteria.bachelorsDegree: A Bachelor's degree in a related field from an accredited institution.
eligibilityCriteria.minimumGPA: A minimum GPA of 3.2 on a 4.0 scale.
eligibilityCriteria.workExperience: At least 2 years of relevant work experience (optional, but preferred).
eligibilityCriteria.statementOfPurpose: A compelling statement of purpose outlining research interests and career goals.

general_info.summary: The provided text lists various campuses and entities associated with Amity University, including locations across India (Noida, Lucknow, Jaipur, Gurgaon, Gwalior, Mumbai, Raipur, Kolkata, Ranchi, Patna) and internationally (Dubai, London). It also mentions specific sectors within Gurgaon and Vasundhara, along with "Amity University Online" and "Amity University Press," and names of specialized institutes like "Amity Institute for Competitive of Management & Allied Areas(ADMAA)" and "Amity Indian Military College."
general_info.raw_content:
• Amity University Noida

• Sector 1, Vasundhara

of Management & Allied Areas(ADMAA)

recruitment_info.summary: This document lists upcoming recruitment opportunities categorized by the passing-out year, primarily focusing on 2024, 2025, 2026, and 2023 batches. For each opportunity, it includes the company name, the relevant passing-out batch, and the last date to apply. Some entries also specify the type of role (e.g., internship, new profile) or any special conditions (e.g., female students only, hybrid).
